title: peet1277
author: peet1277
content: Hello everyone,I'm selling US VISA/Mastercard prepaid cards.Currently 2 types are available:- OneVanilla gift card (balance.vanillagift.com)- Kroger gift card (prepaidgiftbalance.com)Rate is 0.7 (so for $7 you get card with $10 balance). Better rates for bulk buyers.THESE ARE NOT CARDED/ILLEGALLY OBTAINED CARDS - NO CHARGEBACKS!Payment method: LTC/BTC/USDT(TRC-20)Contact:Telegram @peet1277 (beware of impostors)

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: peet1277 on January 31, 2023, 11:37:50 AM- Kroger gift card (prepaidgiftbalance.com)According to many Customer ReviewsforPrepaidGiftBalance.com these cards are scam with 1.2/5 Rating.Do you guarantee that the users' experience will be good and that they will get a refund if these cards do not work?What is the list of sites that accept these cards? Do you work in all sites or are there restrictions on it?Quote from: peet1277 on January 31, 2023, 11:37:50 AMILLEGALLY OBTAINED CARDS - NO CHARGEBACKS!How do you ensure it is legal or not stolen? Your account is new and does not contain a trading history.Are you ready to use a guarantee or even a forum escrow so that you will not get your money until after the buyer reports that the card works, or are you just an intermediary for those sites?If you are just an intermediary, it is best to read the negative comments about this service.

comments.author: peet1277
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on January 31, 2023, 07:02:26 PMQuote from: peet1277 on January 31, 2023, 11:37:50 AM- Kroger gift card (prepaidgiftbalance.com)According to many Customer ReviewsforPrepaidGiftBalance.com these cards are scam with 1.2/5 Rating.Do you guarantee that the users' experience will be good and that they will get a refund if these cards do not work?What is the list of sites that accept these cards? Do you work in all sites or are there restrictions on it?Quote from: peet1277 on January 31, 2023, 11:37:50 AMILLEGALLY OBTAINED CARDS - NO CHARGEBACKS!How do you ensure it is legal or not stolen? Your account is new and does not contain a trading history.Are you ready to use a guarantee or even a forum escrow so that you will not get your money until after the buyer reports that the card works, or are you just an intermediary for those sites?If you are just an intermediary, it is best to read the negative comments about this service.Hello,So first of all, these gift cards are normally sold in US stores physically. Kroger gift card and Vanilla gift card.https://giftcards.kroger.com/visa-gift-cardhttps://www.vanillagift.com/It works in US where VISA/Mastercard is accepted - even online.I have absolutely no problem with using escrow, so the buyer can check the balance and register the card online.I can also give tips on the usage - I use them myself too.

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Your rate is kind of ambiguous because why would someone sell something at 0.7 rate which cost them 1 to buy? Usually card sellers charge a fee on balance but here you're giving discount instead. Do you have any explanation for this, thanks? If these are legit cards then good service and good luck.

comments.author: peet1277
comments.body: Quote from: bnbstorm on January 31, 2023, 07:46:33 PMYour rate is kind of ambiguous because why would someone sell something at 0.7 rate which cost them 1 to buy? Usually card sellers charge a fee on balance but here you're giving discount instead. Do you have any explanation for this, thanks? If these are legit cards then good service and good luck.Hello,This way I still have a small profit margin on them, but if you look around on Paxful for example, you'll find more sellers at similar rate.As I mentioned earlier, I have no problem with escrows till I gain some of your trust here. I'm new here, but I'd like to have this service long here, and I'll work on customer satisfaction.

comments.author: peet1277
comments.body: BUMP.New stock of VISA gift cards.Currently available denominations:- $ 10- $ 12- $ 16- $ 17- $ 25- $ 30- $ 40- $ 50Please note specific denominations can be out of stock when contacting me.$ 100 ones to be restocked within this week.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.created_time: February 25, 2023, 12:46:55 PMLast edit: June 10, 2023, 11:04:25 AM by CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Hi. Does them work to add on all paypal accounts? If you know. I underdstand if it does not work, but not harm to ask I can take a chance on a 10$ card i guess

comments.author: paultawdon
comments.body: Does it work on Bing ads?
